blogs.title: What's unique about vilcrypt?
blogs.author: Syed Vilayat Ali Rizvi
blogs.matter: vilcrypt is a powerful, non-hash algorithm based, python encryption module developed by Syed Vilayat Ali Rizvi. Vilcrypt is unique due to its unique encryption mechanism, from which it manipulates data.

blogs.title: What vilcrypt have to offer in the nexct upcoming years?
blogs.author: Syed Vilayat Ali Rizvi
